text: "See You Again" is a song by American rapper Wiz Khalifa featuring the vocals and piano playing of Charlie Puth. The song is featured in the 2015 action movie Furious 7. It was created as a final tribute to Paul Walker, who died in a car crash in November 2013. The single was released on March 17, 2015 in the US, followed by an international release on April 3 and a UK release on April 12. ==References== Category:2015 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Wiz Khalifa songs Category:Charlie Puth songs
title: See You Again (Wiz Khalifa song)
